full_summary:
=================
### Automated Fiber Placement Robotic Work Cell

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: CB-76-75099312
* **Amendment Number**: 8
* **Solicitation Number**: 23-58140
* **Publication Date**: October 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 15, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025
* **Tender Status**: **Expired**

#### Procurement Details

* **Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Description of Work

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the design, fabrication, and installation of an automated fiber placement robotic work cell for dry fiber, thermoset prepreg, and thermoplastic applications. The new system is to be delivered at the NRC facility located in Boucherville, Quebec.

The equipment will be used to support the development of applications using thermoplastic and thermosetting materials. The automated fiber placement cell will also allow users to develop and characterize various composite materials.

The scope of work includes:

* Design and fabrication of an automated fiber placement robotic work cell
* Installation of the new system at the NRC facility in Boucherville, Quebec
* Training of NRC staff on the operation and maintenance of the equipment

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Kacendra Dion
Email: [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
Phone: (438) 324-8125

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA
